Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.Weapon
  • public class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
    Weapons are a special type of card used by the Player to Move, Damage and Mark other Players.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private AttackPattern attackPattern
      A data structure that fully encompasses the Weapon's behaviour and functionalities.
      private boolean loaded
      Whether or not the Weapon is loaded.
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the Weapon.
      private AmmoCubes purchaseCost
      The cost of purchasing the Weapon from a SpawnCell's shop.
      private AmmoCubes reloadCost
      The cost of reloading the Weapon after having used it.
